subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Montreal Canadiens traded the veteran forward Daniel Briere to the Colorado Avalanche for forward Pierre-Alexandre Parenteau and a fifth-round pick in the 2015 draft.
snippet: The Montreal Canadiens traded the veteran forward Daniel Briere to the Colorado Avalanche for forward Pierre-Alexandre Parenteau and a fifth-round pick in the 2015 draft.
